translations: v.引用，引证（quote 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The data you are quoting is on Child Main Nutrition.
sentences.translation: 你所引用的数据在《儿童主要的营养》。

sentences.sentence: Defenders of the Corporation—of whom there are many—are fond of quoting the American slogan "If it ain' t broke, don't fix it."
sentences.translation: 公司的捍卫者有很多，他们喜欢引用美国的口号：”如果它没坏，就不要修理它。”

sentences.sentence: If the worst happens, you lose your bike, you should immediately report it to the police station, quoting that serial number that should have been stamped.
sentences.translation: 如果最坏的情况发生了，也就是你把自行车弄丢了，那么你应该立即向警察局报案，并引用那个应该盖上印章的序列号。
